import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import Spacer from "react-spacer"; import { Container, Row, Col, InputGroup, FormControl, Form, Button, Image, } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./styles.css"; import one from "../../../assets/one.svg"; export default function GeralInfo(props) { const [geral, setGeral] = useState({}); const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, } = useForm(); const onSubmit = (data) => { setGeral(data); props.next(data); }; const history = useHistory(); function handleClick() { history.push("/dashboard"); } return (
